divs: sighting detailsi was staring at my window before going to bed at night and i was on the phone at the same time, i suddenly saw a light falling from the sky. first, i though that it was a plane but it came closer and i realized that it was something like a fireball. i shouted "it's going to fall on the roof and it'll exploit" to my friend on the phone and i stayed there to watch if anything burns. nothing burned, it landed on top of the roof and the lights\fireball effect disappeared. it was moving like it's falling, but it was not something like falling. it was straight-line path and planned landing, i'm sure. i was shocked and frozen, i still am though.
